thread.title: Kushner Cos. and LNR Negotiating Debt on Manhattan Skyscraper

author: Peter Grant
title: Kushner Cos. and LNR Negotiating Debt on Manhattan Skyscraper
text:
In 2007, when New Yorkâ€™s go-go commercial real-estate market was near its peak, Kushner Cos. purchased the office tower at 666 Fifth Ave. in Manhattan for what was then a record $1.8 billion using mostly debt.
Now, that debt is moving to center stage as Kushner Cos. works to finalize a deal to bring in Brookfield Asset Management as a roughly 50% partner in the 39-story tower, according to people familiar with the matter.
